info.name: Borderlink Immigration Backend (api/v1) - users_access, data_ingestion, immigration_cases, ai_decisions
info.description:
Generated from Django URLConfs:
- users_access mounted at /api/v1/auth/
- data_ingestion mounted at /api/v1/data-ingestion/
- immigration_cases mounted at /api/v1/imigration-cases/ (note spelling)
- ai_decisions mounted at /api/v1/ai-decisions/

Auth model:
- Login returns an endpoint_token in JSON
- Login verify sets Secure cookies (access_token, fingerprint, sessionid, etc.) used by the backend's CookieAccessOnlyTokenAuthentication

Postman tips:
- Use https base URL if you want Secure cookies to be sent.
- Ensure Postman Cookie Jar is enabled.

Collection variables you’ll likely set:
- baseUrl (default: https://localhost:8000)
- endpointToken (set automatically after Login)
- caseId, caseFactId, dataSourceId, parsedRuleId, validationTaskId, etc.

item.name: Login Verify (OTP or 2FA) (sets cookies)
item.description: This endpoint sets Secure cookies (access_token, fingerprint, sessionid, etc.). Ensure you use https and Cookie Jar is enabled.

item.name: Profile Avatar (PATCH compatibility - update nationality fields)
User Profiles - Update (PATCH) (compat on detail path)
Admin Notifications - Create (POST) (compat on list path)
